bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Under Chapter 193 of the Act passed on April 9, 1824 by the Village of Brooklyn Board of Trustees, bids and contracts were required to grade and pave streets. Michael Tally, Owen Tally, and James Gildersleeve were the three individuals hired by the Trustees to perform the grading and paving work.
